page.title: 09AN EVENING AT HOME
page.content: {AFTER SCHOOL,}I GET HOME AND HAVE TEA QUITE EARLY AT 4 O'CLOCK AND WATCH TELEVISION FOR A BIT. AFTER TEA I DO MY{PIANO PRACTICE}FOR 15 MINUTES WHILE MUM BRINGS THE WASHING IN AND STARTS IRONING. SOMETIMES I GO UPSTAIRS TO MY BEDROOM TO LISTEN TO MY BROTHERS PLAYING THEIR RECORDS BEFORE THEY GO OUT TO PLAY FOOTBALL.{DAD COMES IN {FROM WORK}AT ABOUT 7.40 p.m. WE HAVE SUPPER TOGETHER. BY THE TIME I FINISH SUPPER IT IS ABOUT 8.30 p.m.SO I GO AND PUT MY NIGHTIE ON BEFORE COMING DOWNSTAIRS AGAIN TO WATCH TELEVISION. BETWEEN 9 AND 10 O'CLOCK{I GO TO BED AND DAD MAKES ME A CUP OF OVALTINE AND BRINGS IT UP TO MY BEDROOM. THE REST OF THE FAMILY COMES UP TO BED AFTER I AM ASLEEP.
